# @toolbox-web/grid

> A high-performance, framework-agnostic data grid built with pure TypeScript and native Web Components. Zero runtime dependencies. Works in vanilla JS, React, Angular, Vue, Svelte, and any JavaScript environment.

Important notes:

- This is a **Web Component** (`<tbw-grid>`) that works natively in all frameworks without wrappers (though optional adapter packages exist for React and Angular to enable JSX/template renderers)
- All features are **opt-in via plugins** - import only what you need for tree-shaking
- Configuration uses a **single source of truth** pattern via `gridConfig` property
- Editing requires `EditingPlugin` - calling `editable: true` without it will throw a helpful error
- The grid uses **light DOM** (not Shadow DOM) for CSS cascade and accessibility

## Framework Adapters

- [@toolbox-web/grid-angular](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@toolbox-web/grid-angular): Angular adapter with structural directives (`*tbwRenderer`, `*tbwEditor`)
  - [Reactive Forms Integration](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-angular-reactive-forms-integration--docs): Bind FormArray to grid with cell-level validation
- [@toolbox-web/grid-react](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@toolbox-web/grid-react): React adapter with `DataGrid` component, hooks, and JSX renderers

## Plugins

- [Editing Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-editing--docs): Inline cell/row editing with built-in editors
- [Selection Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-selection--docs): Cell, row, and range selection
- [Filtering Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-filtering--docs): Column filters with text, number, date, set, boolean types
- [Multi-Sort Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-multi-sort--docs): Sort by multiple columns with priority
- [Row Grouping Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-grouping-rows--docs): Group rows by field values
- [Column Grouping Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-grouping-columns--docs): Group columns under shared headers
- [Tree Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-tree--docs): Hierarchical tree data display
- [Master-Detail Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-master-detail--docs): Expandable detail rows
- [Pinned Columns Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-pinned-columns--docs): Sticky columns left/right
- [Pinned Rows Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-pinned-rows--docs): Sticky rows top/bottom
- [Responsive Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-responsive--docs): Card layout for narrow viewports with breakpoints
- [Reorder Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-reorder--docs): Drag-and-drop column reordering
- [Visibility Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-visibility--docs): Column visibility panel
- [Column Virtualization Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-column-virtualization--docs): Horizontal virtualization for many columns
- [Export Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-export--docs): Export to CSV, JSON, Excel XML
- [Context Menu Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-context-menu--docs): Right-click menus
- [Clipboard Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-clipboard--docs): Copy/paste with Ctrl+C/V
- [Undo/Redo Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-undo-redo--docs): Edit history
- [Server-Side Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-server-side--docs): Virtual scrolling with lazy loading from remote APIs, block-based caching, and server-side sorting/filtering integration
- [Pivot Plugin](https://toolboxjs.com/?path=/docs/grid-plugins-pivot--docs): Pivot table transformation
